feedback.descrizione: what an enjoyable day! Greetings from south pole!
Nice museum, nice staff. We had a great time here in Roccacannuccia
The owner is a fiend of mine, so i didn't pay the ticket, worthy!
Nice museum, but there is not a snack bar! :_(
